content.title: BASTION Creators Present Their Vision Of HADES In The New Title's Reveal (And Also Launch) Trailer - GameFragger.com
The creator of Bastion just released a surprise new game called Hades - PC Gamer
content.desc: What's this? A new game from Supergiant, creator of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre? It is so. At The Game Awards today, Supergiant revealed that its new game, ...
